org.treetank.access
Class ReadTransaction

java.lang.Object
  org.treetank.access.ReadTransaction
All Implemented Interfaces:
IReadTransaction
Direct Known Subclasses:
WriteTransaction
public class ReadTransaction
extends Object
implements IReadTransaction

ReadTransaction

Read-only transaction wiht single-threaded cursor semantics. Each read-only transaction works on a given revision key.

Field Summary

          Session state this write transaction is bound to.

close

public void close()
           throws org.treetank.exception.AbsTTException
Close shared read transaction and immediately release all resources. This is an idempotent operation and does nothing if the transaction is already closed.

Specified by:
close in interface IReadTransaction
Throws:
org.treetank.exception.AbsTTException - If can't close Read Transaction.
